Package com.pyszkowski.http.util

Class HttpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pyszkowski.http.util.HttpUtils
  • public class HttpUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides useful static helper methods for handling http communication.

                                  java.lang.String... message)
                           throws ServerException
        Respons with a given response status and message.
        Parameters:
        response - the object to write the response to
